physical_appearance: This is a chakla or a hanging textile. It features a cotton weave with embroidery work. The chakla is decorated with stylized depictions of two figures riding on elephants, with the Hindu god Ganesha in the center. On the bottom, there are five dangling panels, with stylized depictions of birds, flowers, and a human figure.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) flower (motif) birds (motifs) deities depictions (visual works) swastikas beadwork (visual works)
